extractFactDictList.question: How many NBA teams have never won a championship?
extractFactDictList.sentence: As of 2023, there are 10 NBA teams that have never won a championship.

extractFactDictList.question: Which NBA team is owned by Michael Jordan?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Charlotte Hornets: Owned by Michael Jordan, the team has consistently underperformed for the last decade.

extractFactDictList.question: What is the biggest achievement of the Denver Nuggets so far?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Denver Nuggets: Their biggest achievement thus far is reaching the Western Conference Finals.

extractFactDictList.question: Which NBA team has not only lost their Canadian roots (Vancouver), but also watched Toronto get a title before them?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Memphis Grizzlies: They have not only lost their Canadian roots (Vancouver), but watched Toronto, which came into the league the same year, get a title before them.

extractFactDictList.question: Which NBA team is yet to win a championship despite making the NBA playoffs?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Minnesota Timberwolves: They have never won an NBA championship despite making the NBA playoffs.

extractFactDictList.question: Which NBA team has Kevin Durant in tow for a full season, and could 2023-24 be the year for them to end their drought?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Phoenix Suns: With Kevin Durant in tow for a full season, could 2023-24 be the year for the Suns to end their drought?

extractFactDictList.question: What is noteworthy about winning a championship in the NBA?
extractFactDictList.sentence: It's important to note that winning a championship is hard and staying on this list is even harder, in so many ways.
extractFactDictList.phrase: It's hard and staying on the list is even harder, in so many ways.
